subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mako and Don Budge teamed up to win two U.S. and two Wimbledon titles, and they met in the 1938 Open singles final, with Budge beating Mako to complete the sport’s first Grand Slam.
snippet: Mako and Don Budge teamed up to win two U.S. and two Wimbledon titles, and they met in the 1938 Open singles final, with Budge beating Mako to complete the sport’s first Grand Slam.
